articles.title: Stretch Drive: Blue Jays in control of playoff destiny with four weeks to go - Sportsnet.ca
articles.description: A series win over the Baltimore Orioles this week gave the Toronto Blue Jays some much-needed breathing room in the American League playoff race. Canada's lone Major League Baseball team is in control of its own destiny with four weeks left in the regular sea…
articles.content:
